Posted By: Moosecadet (11/1/2009 5:03:41 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Squee's my favorite card because he's totally expendable. He gets killed and keeps coming back for more. Very combo-friendly, and he's got more cards to go with him than any other critter I've seen (Squee's Toy, Squee's Revenge, Squee's Embrace, General's Regalia, Firestorm, Legerdemain, Phantom Wings etc.) If you use Squee in a goblin deck you can't go wrong with Goblin Chirurgeon, which lets you sacrifice a goblin to regenerate a creature.
posts.html:
Squee's my favorite card because he's totally expendable. He gets killed and keeps coming back for more. Very combo-friendly, and he's got more cards to go with him than any other critter I've seen (Squee's Toy, Squee's Revenge, Squee's Embrace, General's Regalia, Firestorm, Legerdemain, Phantom Wings etc.) If you use Squee in a goblin deck you can't go wrong with Goblin Chirurgeon, which lets you sacrifice a goblin to regenerate a creature.

posts.post_content: I made a deck that ran four [Linessa, Zephyr Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Linessa, Zephyr Mage), four [Tortured Existence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tortured Existence) and four [Squee, Goblin Nabob](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Squee, Goblin Nabob). Used the grandeur ability to pitch Linessa to the grave and bounce up to 4 permanents to their hand...then for {B} I could discard a Squee and do it again, at instant speed. That deck certainly was annoying.

posts.post_content:
Squee, the annoying Planeswalker ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)   
   
Planeswalker - Squee
  
   
+1 until the begining of your next upkeep Squee becomes a 1/1 goblin creature. if it would die, return it to the battlefield with loyalty counters on it equal to the amount on it when it died
  
   
-1 exile the top 3 cards of your library, if you would discard a card, you may put one of the exiled cards into your grave yard instead
  
   
-4 put a 1/1 goblin creature token on to the battlefield with "when this creature dies, put a token that is a copy of this creature on to the batlefeild ant the begining of the next end step"
  
   
loyalty = 1
  
   
(sry for some bad wordings (especialy the +1))
posts.html:
Squee, the annoying Planeswalker

Planeswalker - Squee

+1 until the begining of your next upkeep Squee becomes a 1/1 goblin creature. if it would die, return it to the battlefield with loyalty counters on it equal to the amount on it when it died

-1 exile the top 3 cards of your library, if you would discard a card, you may put one of the exiled cards into your grave yard instead

-4 put a 1/1 goblin creature token on to the battlefield with "when this creature dies, put a token that is a copy of this creature on to the batlefeild ant the begining of the next end step"

loyalty = 1
